artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Blue, blue/green, olive warp. Tan, light tan, metallic silver weft. Plain weave variation.  Stapled to 8.5x11" card with 99.1.1213.26. "H-8B" written on card. (blues, olive, tan, metallic)
